= Permalink =

The following permalink paramaters are supported:

 * lang: language, possible values: en, fr, de etc..
 * easting: easting position in Google oordinate 900913
 * northing: easting position in Google oordinate 900913
 * zoom: zoom level from 0 to 22
 * overlayOpacity: opacity of the overlay layers from 0 to 1
 * autload: boolean, per default true, used to autoload data from a swiss data source
 * debug: boolean, per default false, used to use the uncompress version of the JavaScripts
